title: LFG - Odyssey: 3 Aug or Sona/Ziggs
body:
Hey guys!
Yuujou here. 

I love playing Odyssey and thought it would be fun to do some missions with the community.
Going to be playing at around 6 pm PST. Just add me and drop a note here so I know you're from the boards. ^_^

replies.body: DARK BLOW JÃ–BS here added you
I don't know if you really want to point out your name to a Rioter ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
plz add me 5 ZIGGS MISSION IM LOOKING FOR TEAM

For the records, if you're still trying to do the 5 Ziggs/Sona, a full Ziggs team works well. 

* 1 DPS on-hit: All the augments that improve your passive and aa, with BtrK, Rageblade, Nashor, Wits End, etc.
* 1 enchanter: healing hexmines+refresher, the shield on W, the splitting Q+hexmine on Q, with full support build, Censer, Athenes, Redemption, etc.
* 1 full AP with improved R and Q, with high AP items, including Morello and Sorc shoes, for maximum burst during the critical phases. 
* 1 kiting build with max CDR + Liandry+Rylai with improved Q generating mines and Seekers. You can take the healing mines and a Censer too, but due to Seeker sometimes making it hard to heal with the mines you're not the primary healer. Or don't take healing at all and go for Refresher instead and more AP. Anyway, you don't have enough room for Morello+Sorc shoes so take a Void Staff instead, I think.
* 1 tank: improved Satchel for max CC, with max CDR, Abyssal Mask, and generic Tank items. You don't need AP thanks to Daredevil to still deal damage, but it's not your main goal.

It works super well, is easy to play, and solves both the "5 same champs" and the "Ziggs/Sona only" missions.
Please add me, I have 3 Aug and sona/ziggs missions
if you have discord add me: AGGRESSIVE JIZZER#2844
